Legal_Issue: Breach of procedural fairness and incorrect assessment of chosen occupation
Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, Regulations
Evidence_Assessment: Documents deemed unreliable without prior notice to applicant
Burden_of_Proof: On applicant to demonstrate eligibility, but procedural fairness required
Legal_Rule: Visa officers must assess under chosen NOC and provide opportunity to respond to document concerns
Procedural_Issue: Failure to inform applicant of document reliability concerns
Grounds_for_Claim: Insufficient work experience and unreliable documents
Outcome_on_Merits: Not reached due to procedural breach
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Breach found â€“ applicant not given chance to address concerns
Applicant_Challenge: Dismissal without proper assessment or notice
Court_Result: Judicial review granted, case remitted for redetermination
Legal_Rule_Source: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, Regulations
Outcome: Application dismissed initially; remitted for reassessment
Legal_Provision: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, Regulations
Legal_Provision_Cited: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, Regulations
